original: Larsson, Erik Leonard, husdjurs-konsulent, Falkenberg, f. 29/12/92 i Eftra, Hall. 1., av Lars Johan Svensson o. Anna Josefina Bengtsson. G. 19 m. Hedvig Maria Bengtsson. Barn: Barbro f. 21, Lars 22, Anna Lena 28, Bengt 31 (samti. m. namnet Drejare). — Stud :ex. i Halmstad 13, agronomex. å Ultuna 16. Anst. v. Jämtl. 1. folkh:- o. lantmannask. 16-18 Bill-strömska folkhögsk. 18. Husdjurskonsul. i Halland sed. 19. Stift, av samt sekr. 20-35 i Falkenbergtsort. lantbr :’kl., hed:led. sed. 45, sekr. o. verkst. istyr :’led. i Mejeriernas cen-tralfören. u. p. a, 29-35, sekr. i org:-komm. f. bild. av Fören. Västra Sv res äggcentr. u. p. a,, org. av RLF i Hall. 29-30, stift, av samt sekr. o. verkst. styr :led. 43-46 i Fören. Husdjursavelns rationaliser. i Hall. u. p. a. (HARH), sekr. i Hall. läns hush rsällsk. hus-djursnd 35. Resor t. Danm. 19 o. 22, Norge 26, Engl., Holl. o. Tyskl. 28, Finl. 29, Engl. 30. Skr.: Kalvningsål-dern, le tåler i sv. låglandsboskap (35), Om huish isällskapens undervisn:- o. försöksverksamh. (41), Om börsför-säljn. av hingstar o. tjurar (43), ett st. ant. art. i tidn. o. tidskr. Medarb. i Hall. Lantmannatidn. sed. 26, utg. Fören. HARH årsbok 45. Hobbies: fotboll, fiske.
translated:
Larsson, Erik Leonard, livestock consultant, Falkenberg, b. 29/12/92 in Eftra, Halland. Son of Lars Johan Svensson and Anna Josefina Bengtsson. Married to Hedvig Maria Bengtsson from 19xx. Children: Barbro b. 21, Lars b. 22, Anna Lena b. 28, Bengt b. 31 (also known as Drejare). 

Education: Completed school examination in Halmstad in 1913, agricultural examination at Ultuna in 1916. Employed by Jämtland's 1st popular and farmer's school from 1916-1918, Billström's popular school in 1918. Livestock consultant in Halland since 1919. Secretary of the Falkenberg local agricultural association from 1920-1935, honorary chairman since 1945, secretary and executive board member of the Central Association of Dairies from 1929-1935, secretary of the organizing committee for the establishment of the Association of Western Sweden's Egg Center, organizer of the Dairy Cattle Breeding Association in Halland from 1929-1930, secretary and executive board member from 1943-1946 of the Association for Rationalization of Livestock Breeding in Halland (HARH), secretary of the Halland County Livestock Society from 1935. 

Travels to Denmark in 1919 and 1922, Norway in 1926, England, the Netherlands, and Germany in 1928, Finland in 1929, and England in 1930. 

Writings: "Calving Age Limitation for Swedish Lowland Cattle" (1935), "About the Education and Experimental Work of Livestock Societies" (1941), "On the Exchange Sales of Stallions and Bulls" (1943). Contributed several articles to various newspapers and journals. Collaborator in Halland Farmer's Journal since 1926, editor of HARH's Yearbook in 1945. Hobbies: football, fishing.
